naslov: Okrug Gornji, VILA SA BAZENOM/ 30m od plaže/ pogled/ VIDEO -čitaj opis (prodaja)
opis: - ekskluzivna nekretnina agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. NAPOMENA: na upit šaljemo detaljne slike i video interijera, eksterijera, prilaza, plaže itd. + OBJEKAT JE VLASNIŠTVO FIRME / POTENCIJANI KUPAC KUPUJE FIRMU Ako tražite savršeno mjesto za odmor ili život uz more, ne propustite ovu priliku! Ova moderna vila, građena 2022. godine, nudi sve što vam treba za ugodan i kvalitetan boravak. Nalazi se na zemljištu od 501 m2, s prekrasnim pogledom na more i otok Čiovo. Vila ima cca 290 m2 stambene površine, raspoređene na tri etaže. Na prvoj etaži se nalazi prostrani dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, koji ima izlaz na terasu s bazenom i sunčalištem. Na drugoj etaži se nalaze tri spavaće sobe, svaka s vlastitom kupaonicom i balkonom, a na trećoj etaži (suteren/podrum) je spavaća soba sa dnevnim boravkom, praona, spremište i garaža... Kompletno je opremljena i namještena. Vila ima i privatan prilaz do plaže, koju dijeli sa još tri kuće u susjedstvu. Pogodna za turizam ili življenje u mirnom dijelu Okruga, blizu svih potrebnih sadržaja ENG............................................................. - exclusive property of the agency #adriaINgroup - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: upon request, we send detailed pictures and videos of the interior, exterior, driveway, beach, etc. + THE PROPERTY IS PROPERTY OF THE COMPANY / THE POTENTIAL BUYER IS BUYING THE COMPANY If you are looking for the perfect place to vacation or live by the sea, don't miss this opportunity! This modern villa, built in 2022, offers everything you need for a pleasant and quality stay. It is located on a plot of 501 m2, with a beautiful view of the sea and the island of Čiovo. The villa has approximately 290 m2 of living space, spread over three floors. On the first floor there is a spacious living room with a kitchen and a dining room, which has access to a terrace with a swimming pool and a sun deck. On the second floor there are three bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and balcony, and on the third floor (basement/basement) there is a bedroom with a living room, a laundry room, a storage room and a garage. It is fully equipped and furnished. The villa also has a private access to the beach, which it shares with three other houses in the neighborhood. Suitable for tourism or living in a quiet part of the district, close to all necessary amenities #adriaINgroup real estate-consulting-design-development-VIP service ...............................................................
